body:
I can't suggest the ideal solution for the problem.

Maybe, we can remove stfu when `YII_DEBUG` is true...

issue.title: A Session bug.

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework

issue.body:
File `https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/blob/master/framework/web/User.php : 573`

If set session handler is redis, function `regenerateID` will be error.

body: I can confirm this issue with php7.0.2, yii2.0.6 and yii\redis\Session. I had to switch to yii\web\CacheSession for now.
@githubjeka Seems to be working properly, thanks!
